faq.title: Common Questions, Expert Answers
faq.description: Get quick answers to your most pressing questions about our platform. We've compiled everything you need to know about revolutionizing your healthcare facility.

items.question: What is the platform?
items.answer: Waylio is a comprehensive campus management platform for large healthcare facilities. It combines hyper-accurate AR indoor navigation with smart parking, appointment booking, virtual queue management, and digital prescriptions into a single, user-friendly app for patients and staff.

items.question: How secure is the platform?
items.answer: The platform is built with security as a priority. All data, especially health records and payment information, is secured using industry-standard encryption. We enforce strict role-based access controls for all staff and doctor dashboards to ensure data is only seen by authorized personnel.

items.question: What are the key features for patients?
items.answer: Waylio integrates four key services: 1. AR Indoor Navigation to guide you turn-by-turn, 2. Smart Appointments with digital e-check-in and live queue tracking, 3. Digital Prescriptions sent directly to your app, and 4. Smart Parking to find and navigate you to an assigned spot.

items.question: How does pricing work?
items.answer: We offer custom pricing plans tailored to the size and needs of your campus, adhering to a flexible, 'Pay-as-You-Go' model. We support everything from single facilities to multi-campus health systems. Contact our sales team for a detailed quote.

items.question: What kind of support do you provide?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive implementation support, including campus mapping and integration. The platform includes a 'Complaints / Feedback Resolution Mechanism' for your admin team, and we offer dedicated technical and operational support.
